resources.string: The module has not been activated. Click to activate
Active display/SystemUI (OP7Pro) not added click Add (requires tai chi Magisk)
Pick up the phone to show is turned on
Please enable pick up the phone to show
pick up the phone to show is not open, please go to the system settings to open the pick up to show
Although the function of this module is not a pick up ambient display, but the system settings of this option must be turned on, otherwise the function will not work
7pro users strongly recommend opening the “touch screen to show” at the same time for a better experience(6T can also try）

Pay attention to the number of times of the screen and the last time of the screen. If the number of times and time of the screen does not change with the screen open/close, the module does not work properly. If this is caused by a module update, try re-hooking the module and restarting the screen. Or check if the storage permission is granted, and the system raises the hand to open the screen.
Storage permissions are not granted. A lot of features will be wrong!
PureMusic / FlatMusic mode has been tested to support lyrics display, other modes are not supported. Remember: not all themes support all the settings and features.
Force Restart Ambient Display, Root required (not 7Pro)
Force Restart SystemUi and Ambient Display, Root required (7Pro)
A Memo will be displayed when AOD is enabled
Get system Weather APP data by CP, displayed on the screen information, and the data follow the system Weather App.
Upside down mobile phone or in the pocket automatic screen off (7Pro slow response）
DO NOT AOD when NightMode is on
When this option is on, NightMode ON -> Aod OFF. When this option is off, NightMode has nothing to do with AOD
